block.p: FISH-Seena (nee Israel), of Brooklyn Heights, N.Y., died September 26 after a lengthy illness. Beloved wife of Charles Fish, cherished sister of Arline Gardner, devoted mother of Melissa Darrow (Paul) of Atlanta, GA, Jason Fish (Courtney) of San Francisco, CA, and Nora Fish of Brooklyn, N.Y., loving grandmother of Susannah, Genevieve, Sarah, Grace & Alexander. Memorial services will be held at 11 A.M., September 27, at the Greenwood Cemetery, Brooklyn.

FISH-Seena (nee Israel), of Brooklyn Heights, N.Y., died September 26 after a lengthy illness. Beloved wife of Charles Fish, cherished sister of Arline Gardner, devoted mother of Melissa Darrow (Paul) of Atlanta, GA, Jason Fish (Courtney) of San Francisco, CA, and Nora Fish of Brooklyn, N.Y., loving grandmother of Susannah, Genevieve, Sarah, Grace & Alexander. Memorial services will be held at 11 A.M., September 27, at the Greenwood Cemetery, Brooklyn.
